TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontStretch extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

Docs.summary: Describes the degree to which a font has been stretched compared to the normal aspect ratio of that font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font. The values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9—lower values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths. |Font stretch|usWidthClass|% of normal| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||1|50.0%| ||2|62.5%| ||3|75.0%| ||4|87.5%| ||5|100.0%| ||6|112.5%| ||7|125.0%| ||8|150.0%| ||9|200.0%| For more information on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *fontStretchesValue* A value expressed as the name string, such as "Condensed", "Normal", or "Expanded".

MemberSignature.Value: string IFormattable.ToString (string format, IFormatProvider provider);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance string System.IFormattable.ToString(string format, class System.IFormatProvider provider) cil managed

Docs.param:
The <see cref="T:System.String"> specifying the format to use.
-or-
`null` to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.

The <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider"> to use to format the value.
-or-
`null` to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.String"> containing the value of the current instance in the specified format.
